Task: Retrieve the raw metal from the depot cut it to size and leave it at the workbench.
We have an unknown package at the dock. Scan its ID and then move it to the quarantine zone.
Paint the chassis red and then take a photo of it for the records.
Weld these two steel plates together and place the result in the cooling rack.
Check the temperature of the chemical sample; if it's safe move it to the lab.
The old prototype needs to be destroyed. Cut it into pieces and dump them in the scrap bin.
We need to verify the dimensions of the beam before cutting it.
Grab the white panel apply a black coating and bring it to assembly.
Inventory check: Pick up item 404 scan it weigh it and put it back.
Process the incoming order: Scan the barcode and glue the shipping label on.
There is debris blocking the hall. Cut it up and move it to disposal.
Create a custom joinery. Take wood block A and wood block B and glue them.
Quality Control: Photograph the finished product and verify its length.
Refurbish the rusty gear: Paint it silver and return it to the machine.
Isolate the hazardous container. Measure its radiation level then move to the vault.
Prepare the shipment. Join the box flaps (tape) and scan the final package.
Modification request: Take the pipe from the rack cut it in half and paint both halves yellow.
The sensor is dirty. Bring it to the cleaning station (Vulcan) to be air-blasted (Cut/Air) and then inspect it.
Archive this artifact. Take a high-res photo and place it in Storage B.
Safety protocol: Verify the fire extinguisher weight and return it to the wall mount.
Assembly line: Get the frame weld the brackets and paint it primer grey.
Lost item recovery. Scan the object found in the aisle to identify it then move to Lost & Found.
Prepare the sample for testing. Cut a small slice and weigh it.
Secure the pallet. Strap (Join) the boxes together and move to the loading bay.
Make a sign. Retrieve the board paint the warning color and take a verification photo.
Recycle the electronics. Scan to log the type then cut to destroy data chips.
Fabricate a pipe fitting. Cut the PVC Glue the elbow and verify the diameter.
Cold storage transfer. Measure the food crate temperature; if cold move to the freezer.
Emergency repair. Weld the broken railing and paint over the weld marks.
Return Material Auth. Scan the return label photograph the damage and move to claims department.
